MSSQL.Playerchecker: SELECT TOP (1000) [sid] AS Player_ID, [name] AS Player_Name, [lv] AS [Level], [job] AS Job_Name FROM dbo.{{CharacterResource}} ORDER BY [sid] ASC;
MSSQL.Monsters: SELECT id.[id], n.[value] AS [name], id.[level], v.[value] AS [location] FROM dbo.{{MonsterResource}} id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON id.[name_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} v ON id.[location_id] = v.[code] ORDER BY id.[id] ASC;
MSSQL.Items: SELECT i.id AS Item_ID, s.[value] AS Name_EN FROM dbo.{{ItemResource}} i INNER JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS s ON i.name_id = s.code ORDER BY Item_ID ASC;
MSSQL.Skills: SELECT id.[id] AS Skill_id, n.[value] AS Skillname FROM dbo.{{SkillResource}} AS id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS n ON id.text_id = n.code ORDER BY Skill_id ASC;
MSSQL.States: SELECT sr.state_id, n.[value] AS buff_name FROM dbo.{{StateResource}} sr LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON sr.text_id = n.code ORDER BY sr.state_id ASC;
MSSQL.NPC: SELECT [id] AS NPC_id, (n.[value] + ' ' + n2.[value]) AS npc_title, [x], [y], [contact_script] FROM dbo.{{NpcResource}} nid LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n ON nid.[text_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} n2 ON nid.[name_text_id] = n2.[code] ORDER BY [id] ASC OFFSET 0 ROWS;
MSSQL.Summons: SELECT id.[id] AS Summon_ID, n.[value] AS Summon_Name, sn.[value] AS Card_Name FROM dbo.{{SummonResource}} AS id LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS n ON id.[name_id] = n.[code] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{ItemResource}} AS ir ON id.[card_id] = ir.[id] LEFT JOIN dbo.{{StringResource}} AS sn ON ir.[name_id] = sn.[code] WHERE id.[form] = 1 AND id.[is_riding_only] = 0 ORDER BY id.[id] ASC;

MySQL.Playerchecker: SELECT `sid` AS Player_ID, `name` AS Player_Name, `lv` AS `Level`, `job` AS Job_Name FROM `{{CharacterResource}}` ORDER BY `sid` ASC LIMIT 1000;
MySQL.Monsters: SELECT m.`id`, n.`value` AS `name`, m.`level`, v.`value` AS `location` FROM `{{MonsterResource}}` m LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON m.`name_id` = n.`code` LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` v ON m.`location_id` = v.`code` ORDER BY m.`id` ASC;
MySQL.Items: SELECT i.`id` AS Item_ID, s.`value` AS Name_EN FROM `{{ItemResource}}` i INNER JOIN `{{StringResource}}` s ON i.`name_id` = s.`code` ORDER BY Item_ID ASC;
MySQL.Skills: SELECT s.`id` AS Skill_id, n.`value` AS Skillname FROM `{{SkillResource}}` s LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON s.`text_id` = n.`code` ORDER BY Skill_id ASC;
MySQL.States: SELECT sr.`state_id`, n.`value` AS buff_name FROM `{{StateResource}}` sr LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n ON sr.`text_id` = n.`code` ORDER BY sr.`state_id` ASC;
MySQL.NPC: SELECT nrc.`id` AS NPC_id, CONCAT_WS(' ', n1.`value`, n2.`value`) AS npc_title, nrc.`x`, nrc.`y`, nrc.`contact_script` FROM `{{NpcResource}}` nrc LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n1 ON nrc.`text_id` = n1.`code` LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` n2 ON nrc.`name_text_id` = n2.`code` ORDER BY nrc.`id` ASC;
MySQL.Summons: SELECT s.`id` AS Summon_ID, sn.`value` AS Summon_Name, cn.`value` AS Card_Name FROM `{{SummonResource}}` s LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` sn ON s.`name_id` = sn.`code` LEFT JOIN `{{ItemResource}}` ir ON s.`card_id` = ir.`id` LEFT JOIN `{{StringResource}}` cn ON ir.`name_id` = cn.`code` WHERE s.`form` = 1 AND s.`is_riding_only` = 0 ORDER BY s.`id` ASC;
